lead_paragraph: Matt Murray watched the Pittsburgh Penguins' second-round collapse against the New York Rangers from afar two years ago, the wispy goaltender still a teenage prospect in the spring of 2014 as a 3-1 series lead morphed into a franchise-altering meltdown.

headline.print_headline: Penguins Rookie Goaltender Murray Has Rangers on Brink
headline.main: Penguins Rookie Goaltender Murray Has Rangers on Brink
